title: EasterEgg???

replies.body:
She probably was polymorphed by Dragontrainer Lulu.

I know that on winter wonder Lulu, it comes up as "(Snowman)" so I'm assuming it comes up with "(Dragon)" on her dragon trainer skin.
Hope that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eJPFrMix,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-06T21:28:56.597+0000)
>
> She probably was polymorphed by Dragontrainer Lulu.
> 
> I know that on winter wonder Lulu, it comes up as "(Snowman)" so I'm assuming it comes up with "(Dragon)" on her dragon trainer skin.
> Hope that helps.

that is quite a fun fact
I own winterwonderland lulu and I never noticed that.
